game.name: Forever With You
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Finding love isn't always easy. Within a limited time, manage your life and find someone you truly love.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Finding love isn't always easy. Within a limited time, manage your life and find someone you truly love.
